description_0: A small replica of a green tyrannosaurus is oriented in a three quarter position facing toward the bottom left corner of the image. There is a yellow wall behind the green tyrannosaurus, on the right side of the image on the wall is a dark green sign with white text, above the dark green sign is a black sign with white text. There is a part of the black sign casting a shadow to the right on the far left side of the image. The yellow wall is showing a reflection of the lights on the ceiling, the white floor, and the green tyrannosaurus replica.
description_1: A skeleton of a tortoise is on display inside a Museum. The skeleton is hanging from the ceiling by four support cables. A stone pillar is next to the skeleton. The pillar has two small black lights on it. The shadow of the skeleton is on the wall behind it. Other artifacts are on display below the tortoise. The head of a prehistoric fish is partially cut off from the lower left part of the image. One of the artifacts has a white sign on the front of it. A blue, wavy glow from a water tank is reflecting off of the wall on the side of the skeleton. Small black pictures are near the bottom of the wall in the background. A large picture of a globe is partially cut off from the right of the image. The words "ASIA" and "LAND BRIDGE" are written in white on the globe.
